mapper.sql: a.id, a.name, a.area AS 'area.id', a.address, a.master, a.phone, a.email, a.delflag, ar.name AS 'area.name'
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_business a JOIN sys_area ar on a.area = ar.id where a.delflag=#{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_business( id, name, area, address, master, phone, email, delflag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{area.id}, #{address}, #{master}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_business SET name = #{name}, area = #{area.id}, address = #{address}, master = #{master}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, delflag = #{delFlag} WHERE id = #{id}
